resources.string: Are you sure you want to unpair your device?
You can\'t use your current password as your new password
4 failed PIN attempts. Please provide password.
Password accepted. Please define new PIN.
0000 is an invalid PIN. Please try again.
PIN creation failed. Please pair device again.
You can\'t use your current PIN as your new PIN
Your account has been locked temporarily as a precaution. Please check your email for more information and try again later.
Blockchain Wallet cannot obtain an Internet connection. Please check the connectivity on your device and try again.
Double encrypt password error. Please try again.
Log in to your Blockchain Wallet via your PC or Mac at %1$s.
Click Show Pairing Code to reveal a QR Code, a square black & white barcode. Scan the code with your camera.
You should always pair or login if you have access to your Wallet ID and password. Recovering your funds will create a new Wallet ID. Would you like to continue?
Enter your 12 backup words with spaces to recover your funds & transactions
Invalid backup phrase. Please try again
Restoring wallet failed. Please try again
By creating a new wallet you agree to the
An invoice is only valid for 15 minutes. Return to the merchant if you would like to resubmit a payment.
Blockchain Wallet %1$s\n©%2$s Blockchain Luxembourg S.A.\nAll rights reserved.
Enter using your password or forget this wallet
This will leave the app and take you to your browser. Continue?
The selected password is too weak to secure your funds. We strongly suggest you select a different one. Would you like to define a new password?
Press back button again to exit
Your address has been imported successfully. Optionally assign a friendly display name to this address.
Your address has been created successfully. Optionally assign a friendly display name to this address.
Copy this receive address to the clipboard? If so, be advised that other applications may be able to look at this information.
Share this receive address for sending? If so, be advised that other applications may be able to look at this information.
Copy your Wallet ID to the clipboard? If so, be advised that other applications may be able to look at this information.
Secure connection to the host has failed. This might indicate malicious activity. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.
Please check your email to approve this login attempt.
Transactions occur when you receive and send bitcoin.
Transactions occur when you receive and send ether.
Transactions occur when you receive and send bitcoin cash.
Transactions occur when you receive and send Stellar.
Transactions occur when you receive and send Paxos.
to start sending and receiving bitcoin.
Enhanced privacy through hierarchical deterministic addresses.
Customize the way you organize your Bitcoin in your Blockchain Wallet.
Hey, we\'ve added these new features to your Blockchain wallet:
Your wallet is upgrading, please be patient this may take some time depending on the size and age of your wallet.
You are now running the most secure and private Blockchain Wallet. You may continue to your wallet now.
There was an error upgrading your wallet. Please try again later.
Your Blockchain Wallet installation is incomplete. Please re-pair your wallet or create a new one.
You are about to receive bitcoin to a non-spendable address. You can only spend these funds if you have access to the private key. Continue?
The camera is currently opened by another application. Please close other application and try again.
Your password has been changed, please re-pair your wallet

Your verified email address is used to send login codes when suspicious or unusual activity is detected, to remind you of your wallet login ID, and to send bitcoin payment alerts when you receive funds.

Your device appears to be rooted. Be advised that storing funds on a rooted device is unsafe and, in addition, can cause stability issues. If you continue to use our Bitcoin wallet on this device we recommend that you use double encryption on your Blockchain account.
Your wallet already contains this address.
A new address cannot be created at this time. Please try again.
We are unable to connect to the host to establish a secure connection. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.

This item has been archived, and is unaccessible in the mobile app experience. Though you cannot send funds from this item, any funds will remain safe. Simply unarchive this item to start using it again.
This item is not archived. Archive this item if you do NOT want to use it anymore. Your funds will remain safe, and you can unarchive it at anytime.

plurals.name: transfer_success_archive_prompt_plurals
plurals.item: 1 address was successfully transferred to My Bitcoin Wallet. Would you like to archive this address now?
%d addresses were successfully transferred to My Bitcoin Wallet. Would you like to archive these addresses now?

resources.string: This item is set as your default and can\'t be archived.
Your xPub is an advanced feature that contains all of your public addresses.
Sharing your xPub authorizes others to track your transaction history. As authorized persons may be able to disrupt you from accessing your wallet, only share your xPub with people you trust.
Are you sure you want to archive this item?
Are you sure you want to unarchive this item?
Can\'t send to the same address.
This action requires the private key for the Bitcoin address %1$s. Please scan the QR code.

You are about to import a non-spendable address, an address (or public key script) stored in the wallet without the corresponding private key. This means that the funds can be spent ONLY if you have the private key stored elsewhere. If you do not have the private key stored, do NOT instruct anyone to send you bitcoin to the non-spendable address.\n\nThese options are recommended for advanced users only. Continue?
NOTE: The scanned private key does not correspond to your non-spendable address. To spend your funds from this address, please scan the correct private key.

If you are a merchant, show your xPub and use the Blockchain Merchant app to receive funds safely and privately.\n\nKeep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
Keep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
This is a non-spendable address. To spend your funds from this wallet, please scan your private key.

Looks like you have some bitcoins in imported addresses. Imported addresses are not backed up by your Backup Phrase. To secure these funds, we recommend transferring these balances to include in your backup.

Transaction fees impact how quickly the Bitcoin mining network will confirm your transactions, and depend on the current network conditions. We recommend the fee below for this transaction at this time.
You specified an unusually high transaction fee of %1$s.\n\nEven if you lower the fee to %2$s, you can expect the transaction to confirm within the next ~10 minutes (1 block).

You specified an exceptionally small transaction fee of %1$s.\n\nYour transaction may become stuck and possibly never confirm. To increase the likelihood for your transaction to confirm within approximately one hour (6 blocks) we strongly recommend a fee of no less than %2$s.
Your fee is so small that your transaction may never be confirmed.
The Bitcoin mining network is currently experiencing a high volume of activity, resulting in recommended fees that are higher than usual.
Please disable 2-step Verification via SMS in the security settings first.
Please login to your wallet in the web browser to disable 2FA.
Error updating settings, please try again
Write external storage and camera are required to upload KYC documents.
We have sent your mobile phone an SMS message with a verification code. Enter the code to verify your mobile phone number.
Your mobile phone can be used to enable two-factor authentication, helping to secure your wallet from unauthorized access.
Block IP addresses that are known to be part of the Tor anonymizing network. The Tor network is frequently used by hackers attempting to access Blockchain user\'s wallets.
Some screens within the application can display sensitive data. Other applications will be able to access these screenshots.

Your Blockchain Wallet never communicates your password to our servers. This means we have no idea what your password is and we cannot reset it if you forget it. Create a memorable password hint that we can send to your verified email address in case you forget your password.

Your password is never shared with our servers, which means we cannot help reset your password if you forget it. Make sure you backup your funds from the side menu which can restore access to your wallet in the event of a lost password.
We have sent your email address a verification link. Click the link to verify your email address.
Get notified when you receive bitcoin.
Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification.

Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. You can choose to use your mobile phone number to secure your wallet. This code will be requested when you try to access your wallet via the web browser.\n\nIn order to use other authentication methods instead, please login to our web wallet at %1$s
Enjoying the Blockchain Wallet? Please take a moment to leave a review in Google Play and let others know about it.
Using your computer\'s camera, scan the QR code below.
Keep this code hidden until you\'re ready.
Keep this code safe!\nDo not share with others.
Please send%1$s BTC to the Bitcoin address %2$s.
Please send ETH to the Ether address %1$s.
Please send PAX to the USD PAX address %1$s.
Please send BCH to the Bitcoin Cash address %1$s.
Please send XLM to the Stellar address %1$s.
Tap to copy this address. Share it with the sender via email or text.
The PIN you have selected is extremely common and may be easily guessed by someone with access to your phone within 3 tries. Would you like to use this PIN anyway?
You have logged out or there was an error decrypting your wallet. Enter your password below to login.
If you would like to forget this wallet and start over, press \'Forget Wallet\'.
This will erase all wallet data on this device. Please confirm you have your wallet information saved elsewhere otherwise any bitcoin in this wallet will be inaccessible!!
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
This is an oversized bitcoin transaction. Your wallet needs to consolidate many smaller payments you\'ve received in the past. This requires a relatively high fee in order to be confirmed quickly.
"This transaction requires a higher fee for dust consumption due to the small amount of change to be returned."
Be careful! Revealing this text allows your password to be copied to the clipboard, which can then be read by all applications on your device. Also be aware of people standing behind you!
Enable notifications to receive a popup notification whenever you receive bitcoin.
May be at risk for a double spend.
We sent an email to %1$s. Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup.
Add and verify your email address to receive alerts, prevent suspicious activity, and recover your Wallet ID if forgotten.
For your security, we do not keep any passwords on file. Backup your wallet to ensure your funds are safe in case you lose your password.
Prevent unauthorized access to your wallet. Enable 2-Step Verification to increase wallet security.

For your security, Blockchain does not keep any passwords on file. The following 12 word Backup Phrase will give you access to your funds in case you lose your password. Be sure to write it on a piece of paper and to keep it somewhere safe and secure.
It is important to make sure you write down your words exactly as they appear here and in this order.

You can use your Backup Phrase to restore your funds if you lose your password. Anyone with access to your Backup Phrase can access your funds so remember to keep it offline somewhere safe and secure.
Enter the following words from your Backup Phrase to complete the backup process.
Use your fingerprint for faster, easier access to your wallet.\n\nConfirm fingerprint to continue
Are you sure you want to disable fingerprint login?
No fingerprints have been registered to this device yet. Do you want to register a fingerprint now?
Either the fingerprints stored on this device have changed or the keyguard has been disabled
There have been too many failed attempts in the last 30 minutes. Please attempt setup again later.
There have been too many failed attempts. Please log in using your PIN instead.
Copy receive address to another app
View QR code for receive address
Sorry, there was an error generating the QR code
Reveal a receive address when you long-press on the app icon in the launcher, making receiving bitcoin even faster.
Reveal a receive address when you swipe left on the PIN screen, making receiving funds even faster.
Five addresses will be loaded consecutively, after which logging in is required to show new addresses.
No more addresses can be loaded right now. Log in to the app to load more.
Use fingerprint login instead of your PIN to authenticate and access your wallet.
Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup.
We work with exchange partners all over the world, so you can buy bitcoin directly from your wallet.
Send your wallet address to a friend to request funds. An address is a string of random letters and numbers that change for each transaction.
An address can also be shown as a QR code. Scan a friend’s QR code to quickly capture their wallet address.
We’ll keep you up-to-date here with recommendations and new features.
Your Buy Bitcoin trade has been completed!
Buy bitcoin directly from your mobile wallet. It\'s simple, seamless, and secure.
The buy experience may be a little slow on your device. Thanks in advance for your patience.
To use this service, we require you to enter your second password. You should only need to enter this once to use the Buy functionality.
Please enter a valid 2FA code from your authenticator app to continue.
We have just sent you an SMS containing a 2FA code. Please enter it here to continue.
This feature is recommended for advanced users only. By choosing a custom fee, you risk overpaying or your transaction never being confirmed.
To use this service, we require you to enter your second password. You should only need to enter this once to set up your Ether wallet.
At the moment we only support ETH - you cannot receive tokens to this address
Please wait until your previous transaction confirms
Transaction complete! Your transactions and balance will update soon, this can take a few minutes.\n
The total balance shown on this device does not include your linked %1$s.
To keep using Buy & Sell, you’ll need to update your profile. Once completed, you’ll also unlock higher trading limits in Swap.
Introducing USD PAX, a safe and stable crypto asset you can use to store value. 1 PAX equals 1 USD.
Error loading full wallet functionality. Service might temporarily be unavailable.
The version of the app you are using is no longer supported. Please update the app and try again.
Are you sure this is a Bitcoin Cash address?
Sending funds to a bitcoin address by accident will result in loss of funds.
Please select which currency\'s QR code you are scanning.
An improved flow for your mobile buy & sell experience is now available in your wallet. It\'s simple, seamless and secure.
Warning! This is the testnet3 blockchain.
Looks like you started verifying your identity but didn\'t finish. Pick up where you left off.
Your XLM is on its way
We have successfully verified your identity.
Error registering for Airdrop, please try again later.
Your XLM has already been claimed.
We\'re sorry, the airdrop program is currently not available where you are.
Looks like you\'ve already received your airdrop!
We\'re sorry, the XLM airdrop is over. Complete your profile to be eligible for future airdrops and access trading.
Oops! We had trouble processing your airdrop. Please try again.
Introducing USD PAX, a safe and stable crypto asset you can use to store value. 1 PAX equals 1 USD.
Complete your profile to start instantly trading crypto from the security of your wallet.
Your USD PAX transactions will show up here once you make your first transaction.
Exchange one crypto for another without ever leaving your Blockchain Wallet.
This service is not yet available in your state.
Loading information from ShapeShift, please wait…
You currently don\'t have enough of a balance to Swap. Get started by requesting some funds to your wallet.
This trade has expired as we have still not received your funds. If we receive your funds we will complete your trade. If you require further assistance please contact support.
Ether transaction failed, please wait until your previous transaction confirms.
This trade has failed. Please return to the Swap tab to start a new trade
This trade has expired as we have still not received your funds. If we receive your funds we will complete your trade. If you require further assistance please contact support.
Even better, since you need ETH to make USD PAX trades, we just airdropped enough ETH into your Wallet to cover your first 3 transactions\n🙌
The amounts you send and receive may change slightly due to market activity. Once an order starts, we are unable to stop it
Thanks for placing your trade! Funds will usually reach your wallet within 2 hours and we’ll send you a notification when that happens. Keep track of your trade’s progress in the Order History area.
Most exchanges on Swap are completed seamlessly in two hours. Please contact us. Together, we can figure this out.
This trade has expired as we have still not received your funds. If we receive your funds we will complete your trade. If you require further assistance please contact support.
This trade has expired as we have still not received your funds. If we receive your funds we will complete your trade. If you require further assistance please contact support.
There was an error executing your trade. Please try again, or contact support if the issue persists.
Our Blockchain Support Team is standing by to answer any questions you have.
It\'s time to Level Up to a better crypto exchange. First 100,000 traders to sign up will trade free for 30 days.
The only Exchange that connects to your Wallet.
The PIT will be able to:
The PIT will not be able to:
Exchange crypto addresses so you don’t have to copy and paste
Share your Gold or Silver Level status
A new window should open within 10 seconds.
We just sent you a verification email. Your email address needs to be verified before you can connect to The PIT.
Email sent. Check your inbox to continue.
Something went wrong. Please tap Send Again.
You\'re all set to connect your Blockchain Wallet to The PIT.
We could not connect your Wallet to The PIT. Please go back to The PIT and try again.
You have connected your Blockchain Wallet to The PIT. Go back and finish signing up!
The easiest way to exchange one crypto for another without leaving your wallet.
Access competitive crypto prices right at your fingertips.
All Swap trades are confirmed and settled directly on-chain.
With Swap your crypto is safe, secure, and your keys are always intact.
Introducing Digital Dollars (USDp) to de-risk your crypto investment or lock-in gains.
